mapper.select: SELECT LOG_NO, LOG_ID, LOG_IP, DATE_FORMAT(LOG_DATE, '%Y년 %m월 %d일 %H시%i분%S초') AS LOG_DATE FROM JR_DB.LOGIN_LOG ORDER BY LOG_NO DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{paging}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JR_DB.LOGIN_LOG WHERE STR_TO_DATE(LOG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') = STR_TO_DATE(#{today}, '%Y/%m/%d')
SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS ROWNUM, A.LOG_ID, A.LOG_IP, A.LOG_DATE FROM JR_DB.LOGIN_LOG A, (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP WHERE STR_TO_DATE(LOG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') = STR_TO_DATE(#{today}, '%Y/%m/%d')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JR_DB.LOGIN_LOG WHERE STR_TO_DATE(LOG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') >= STR_TO_DATE(#{start}, '%Y/%m/%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(LOG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') <= STR_TO_DATE(#{end}, '%Y/%m/%d')

SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS ROWNUM, A.LOG_ID, A.LOG_IP, A.LOG_DATE FROM JR_DB.LOGIN_LOG A, (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP WHERE STR_TO_DATE(LOG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') >= STR_TO_DATE(#{start}, '%Y/%m/%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(LOG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') <= STR_TO_DATE(#{end}, '%Y/%m/%d') ORDER BY A.LOG_DATE DESC
